DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myDescription: Moves aggregate as individuals between listed cover objects. Moves through these objects in the order they were selected.

myVariables.item: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>coverObjects</myVariableName> <myType>simulationobjects</myType> <myLabel>Cover Objects:</myLabel> <myToolTip>Cover objects for movement</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>Phase Lines</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>DtPhaseLinesFilter</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>threatWaypoint</myVariableName> <myType>simulationobject</myType> <myLabel>Threat Waypoint:</myLabel> <myToolTip>Waypoint representing general location of threat</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>Waypoints</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>DtWaypointsFilter</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>movementSpeed</myVariableName> <myType>rate</myType> <myLabel>Movement Speed</myLabel> <myToolTip>Speed of entity Movement</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>277.778</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>lastCoverGuard</myVariableName> <myType>combo</myType> <myLabel>Last Cover Guard Entities:</myLabel> <myToolTip>Entities to put into "guard" position at last cover object</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>all</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>all;first;none</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>
